description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pit your might against the Dungeon Defendor. Uncover nefarious plots, battle ferocious enemies. And save the peasants!  Discover 24 intense levels, with up to 4 player simultanious Co-op. Only true heros need apply!
